text: DeviantArt (historically stylized as deviantART) is an American online art community and website. It features artwork, videography and photography. DeviantART was created on August 7, 2000 by Angelo Sotira, Scott Jarkoff, and Matthew Stephens and others. DeviantArt, Inc. is headquartered in the Hollywood area of Los Angeles, California."DeviantArt, Inc." Businessweek Investing. Accessed November 9, 2008. DeviantArt had about 36 million visitors each year by 2008. In 2010, DeviantArt users were making about 1.5 million comments each day. In 2011, it was the thirteenth largest social network. It had about 3.8 million visits each week. Several years later, in 2017, the site had more than 25 million members. On February 23, 2017, the company said it was being bought by Wix.com in a $36 million deal. ==References== Category:American social networking websites Category:Art Category:Websites established in the 2000s Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:2000 establishments in the United States
title: DeviantArt
